mapper.select: SELECT R.ROOM_NAME, R.ROOM_IDX FROM CHAT_USER U INNER JOIN CHAT_ROOM R ON U.ROOM_IDX = R.ROOM_IDX WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx} AND R.ROOM_STATUS = 1 AND U.USER_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY R.ROOM_IDX

SELECT CM.ROOM_IDX, TO_CHAR(cm.TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS TIME, CM.MESSAGE_CONTENT, CM.MESSAGE_IDX, CM.USER_IDX, M.USER_NAME, M.USER_PROFILE FROM CHAT_MESSAGE CM JOIN CHAT_USER CU ON CM.USER_IDX = CU.USER_IDX AND CM.ROOM_IDX = CU.ROOM_IDX JOIN MEMBER M ON CU.USER_IDX = M.USER_IDX WHERE CU.ROOM_IDX = #{roomIdx} ORDER BY CM.TIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE (ROOM_IDX, TIME, MESSAGE_CONTENT, MESSAGE_IDX, USER_IDX) VALUES (#{roomIdx}, SYSDATE, #{messageContent}, CHAT_MESSAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAT_USER WHERE ROOM_IDX = 1 AND USER_STATUS = 1
SELECT M.* FROM CHAT_ROOM CR JOIN CHAT_USER CU ON CR.ROOM_IDX = CU.ROOM_IDX JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USER_IDX = CU.USER_IDX WHERE CR.ROOM_IDX = #{roomIdx} AND CU.USER_STATUS = 1
